front.title: Evaluation of further issues on Multicast Mobility: Potential future work for WG MultiMob

abstract.t: This document discusses potential future extensions on the current work plan of recently approved WG MultiMob (Multicast Mobility). MultiMob charter explicitly states that scope of work will be limited to mobility protocols Proxy Mobile IPv6, and multicast group management in terms of IGMPv3/MLDv2 protocols. Furthermore only listener mobility will be dealt with and any modification to these existing protocols and to multicast routing protocols are out of scope.
